title: Ukraineâ€™s New Air Defense System Comes With a Deep Supply of Ammunition
description: The two NASAMS launchers delivered to Kyiv fire common air-to-air missiles used by its allies.
dc:creator: John Ismay
media:description: Military planners decided that the air defense systems NASAMS would be especially useful for Ukraine: The ground-based launcher can fire missiles that were built for fighter jets in aerial combat.
